get.summary: Get a single public catalog item offer by id

parameters.name: includeStopSoldPlans
parameters.description: To include stop sold or hidden plans

parameters.name: hideKeys
parameters.description: Add hide key to retrieve preview items

200.description: Returns a single public or preview offer

404.description: In case offer does not exist

get.summary: Get a list of public available offers

parameters.name: hideKeys
parameters.description: Add hide key to retrieve preview items

200.description: Returns a list of public or preview offers

hasStandardContractAmendments.description: A value indicating whether standard contract amendments are present for this product

publisherMpnId.description: The publisher's Microsoft Partner Network (MPN) Id

determinedStorefronts.description: The list of the storefronts for which this offer is designated

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the item is private

isPreview.description: A value indicating whether the item is preview

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether sale of this item is stopped

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

fulfillBeforeChargeEligible.description: A value indicating whether this item is eligible for fulfill before charge

marketingMaterial.description: Marketing material added by the publisher

ocpSolutionId.description: OCP solution id of the product

legalTermsType.description: Type of to the legal terms

privacyPolicyUri.description: Uri to the privacy policy of the product

categoryIds.description: List of category IDs the marketplace item belongs to

operatingSystems.description: List of operating systems the marketplace item supports

marketCode.description: Market code of a service offer

marketStates.description: Market states of a service offer

industryIds.description: List of industry IDs the item belongs to

cloudIndustryCategories.description: List of cloud industry IDs the item belongs to

supportedProducts.description: It maps to the list of products the publisher provides with which their offer works

applicableProducts.description: Product categories the offer belongs to

serviceType.description: Service type that applies to the offer

competencies.description: Competencies that apply to the offer

hasPrices.description: A value indicating whether the item has prices

duration.description: The duration that applies to the item

marketPricingDetails.description: The pricing details of each market to the item

pricing.description: The pricing that applies to the item

solutionAreas.description: The states that apply to the item

screenshotUris.description: List of screenshot image URIs provided for the item

links.description: List of Links provided for the item

filters.description: List of filters for the item

iconFileUris.description: Dictionary of icon image URIs by icon type

properties.description: Dictionary of properties provided for the item

plans.description: Plans available for the offer details

resourceGroupName.description: Resource group name the gallery item belongs to

additionalProperties.description: Dictionary of additional properties provided for the item

restrictedAudience.description: This fields supports setting explicit audience like subscription, tenant or user

isDeleted.description: A value indicating is the marketplace item deleted

isThirdParty.description: A value indicating whether the product is third party offer or not

groupId.description: This value is used to merge different entities to a single item

hideKeys.description: List of hide keys provided for the item

keywords.description: List of keywords provided for the item

pricingDetailsUri.description: Pricing details uri of the product

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

isByol.description: A value indicating whether it has licensed plans

isMacc.description: A value indicating whether it is MACC eligible

hasFreePlans.description: A value indicating whether it has free plans

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether product is quantifiable

hasPaygPlans.description: A value indicating whether an offer has a 'Pay As You Go' plan

isReseller.description: A value indicating whether microsoft is acting as a reseller

isExcludedFromSearch.description: A value indicating whether the offer should be excluded from search

applicableStoreFronts.description: A value indicating which storefront this offer should surface on

offerVersion.description: Offer version specified by the publisher on publishing portal

isMicrosoftProduct.description: A value indicating whether it is a microsoft product

documentLinks.description: The list of document links provided for the item

linkedAddIns.description: List of linked Add Ins provided for the item

excludeFromBootstrap.description: A value indicating whether the offer should not be re-ingest during bootstrap session

disableSendEmailOnPurchase.description: Indication to disable sending email on purchase

hideFromSaasBlade.description: Indication to hide from SaaS blade

integratedWithMicrosoftGraphApi.description: Indication if there is integrated with Microsoft graph API

isCoreVm.description: Set to true only for offers of OfferType.VirtualMachine to indicate that it was originally of OfferType.CoreVirtualMachine

downloadLink.description: Download link for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

downloadSampleLink.description: Download sample report link for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

omexAssetId.description: Asset ID for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

mixProductId.description: Product ID for offers of type OfferType.PowerBIVisuals

appFreeType.description: Whether an offer has additional purchases required

storeFrontPricings.description: storefront pricings parameters for AppSource and AMP

awards.description: the flag is used in embedded views

searchScore.description: Gets or sets the search relevance score when it is linked to a search score

startDate.description: A value indicating when the sale of this item is going to be stopped

reason.description: A value indicating the reason for stopping to sell this item

alternativeOfferId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative offer provided by the same publisher

alternativePlanId.description: A value indicating an ID of an alternative plan of the same offer

pricing.description: Pricing that applies to the item

marketCode.description: Market code of a service offer

marketStates.description: Market states of a service offer

legacyPlanId.description: Legacy plan Id which is obtained by combining Offer->LegacyId and PlanId with no separator in between

availabilities.description: List of availabilities for this plan

operatingSystem.description: Operating system info for this plan

uiDefinitionUri.description: What blade to open when someone wants to create a marketplace item

artifacts.description: Files related to the marketplace item

isPrivate.description: A value indicating whether the item is private

isHidden.description: A value indicating whether the plan is hidden

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

isByol.description: A value indicating whether it has licensed plans

isFree.description: A value indicating whether it has at least one free availability in any market

isPayg.description: A value indicating whether the plan is 'Pay As You Go'

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether plan has been stopped from selling

stopSellInfo.description: A StopSellInfo object providing stop sell related data

cspState.description: A value indicating whether the product is available for purchase through CSP channel

isQuantifiable.description: A value indicating whether the plan is quantifiable

callToAction.description: The action that can be performed on this plan, on the storefronts

redirectUrl.description: URL to redirect the user to post the performed action on the storefronts

hasRI.description: A value indicating whether the plan supports reservations

isPIRequired.description: A value indicating whether a payment instrument is required

appId.description: App id of the availability collection

planID.description: Plan Id of the availability collection

isStopSell.description: A value indicating whether it has been stopped from sell in a market

hasFreeTrials.description: A value indicating whether it has free trials

RemediationRequired.description: A value indicating whether remediation is required to acquire availability

Remediations.description: Remediation actions for acquiring availability if RemediationRequired is true

startDate.description: Availability effectiveness start date - in epoch minutes

endDate.description: Availability effectiveness end date - in epoch minutes

isPIRequired.description: A value indicating whether a payment instrument is required

msrp.description: Manufacturer's suggested retail price for the item

deploymentTemplateFileUris.description: A dictionary containing the deployment template file IDs defined in the package manifest and corresponding URIs

deploymentFragmentFileUris.description: a dictionary containing the deployment fragment file IDs defined in the package manifest and corresponding URIs

pricingOptions.description: A value indicating what pricing options are available on the application

OfficeCapabilityType.description:
1 = Capability1
2 = Capability2
3 = Capability3
4 = Capability4
5 = Capability5
6 = Capability6
7 = Capability7
8 = Capability8
9 = Capability9
10 = Capability10
11 = Capability11

PageResultOfCatalogItem.description: Represents a feed of entities that includes additional information that OData formats support.

NextPageLink.description: Gets the link for the next page of items in the feed.

Count.description: Gets the total count of items in the feed.

Items.description: Gets the collection of entities for this feed.

ODataQueryOptionsOfCatalogItem.description:
This defines a composite OData query options that can be used to perform query composition.
Currently this only supports $filter, $orderby, $top, $skip.

Request.description: Gets the request message associated with this instance.

RawValues.description: Gets the raw string of all the OData query options

Validator.description: Gets or sets the query validator.

GlobalAssemblyCache.x-deprecatedMessage: The Global Assembly Cache is not supported.

MethodImplAttributes.description:
0 = Managed
1 = Native
2 = OPTIL
3 = Runtime
4 = Unmanaged
8 = NoInlining
16 = ForwardRef
32 = Synchronized
64 = NoOptimization
128 = PreserveSig
256 = AggressiveInlining
512 = AggressiveOptimization
4096 = InternalCall
65535 = MaxMethodImplVal

MemberTypes.description:
1 = Constructor
2 = Event
4 = Field
8 = Method
16 = Property
32 = TypeInfo
64 = Custom
128 = NestedType
191 = All

2 = Out

8192 = HasFieldMarshal

ODataQueryContext.description: This defines some context information used to perform query composition.

Model.description: Gets the given IEdmModel that contains the EntitySet.

ElementType.description: Gets the IEdmType of the element.

NavigationSource.description: Gets the IEdmNavigationSource that contains the element.

ElementClrType.description: Gets the CLR type of the element.

DefaultQuerySettings.description: This class describes the default settings to use during query composition.

EnableExpand.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether navigation property can be expanded.

EnableSelect.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether property can be selected.

EnableCount.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether entity set and property can apply $count.

EnableOrderBy.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether property can apply $orderby.

EnableFilter.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether property can apply $filter.

MaxTop.description: Gets or sets the max value of $top that a client can request.

EnableSkipToken.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the service will use skiptoken or not.

IEdmModel.description: Semantic representation of an EDM model.

SchemaElements.description: Gets the collection of schema elements that are contained in this model.

VocabularyAnnotations.description: Gets the collection of vocabulary annotations that are contained in this model.

ReferencedModels.description: Gets the collection of models referred to by this model (mainly by the this.References).

DeclaredNamespaces.description: Gets the collection of namespaces that schema elements use contained in this model.

EntityContainer.description: Gets the only one entity container of the model.

IEdmSchemaElement.description: Common base interface for all named children of EDM schema.

SchemaElementKind.description: Gets the kind of this schema element.

Namespace.description: Gets the namespace this schema element belongs to.

EdmSchemaElementKind.description:
Defines EDM schema element types.

0 = None
1 = TypeDefinition
2 = Term
3 = Action
4 = EntityContainer
5 = Function

Qualifier.description: Gets the qualifier used to discriminate between multiple bindings of the same property or type.

Term.description: Gets the term bound by the annotation.

Target.description: Gets the element the annotation applies to.

Value.description: Gets the expression producing the value of the annotation.

Type.description: Gets the type of this term.

AppliesTo.description: Gets the AppliesTo of this term.

DefaultValue.description: Gets the DefaultValue of this term.

IEdmTypeReference.description: Represents a references to a type.

IsNullable.description: Gets a value indicating whether this type is nullable.

Definition.description: Gets the definition to which this type refers.

IEdmType.description: Represents the definition of an EDM type.

TypeKind.description: Gets the kind of this type.

EdmTypeKind.description:
Defines EDM metatypes.

0 = None
1 = Primitive
2 = Entity
3 = Complex
4 = Collection
5 = EntityReference
6 = Enum
7 = TypeDefinition
8 = Untyped
9 = Path

IEdmVocabularyAnnotatable.description: Represents an element that can be targeted by Vocabulary Annotations

ExpressionKind.description: Gets the kind of this expression.

EdmExpressionKind.description:
Defines EDM expression kinds.

0 = None
1 = BinaryConstant
2 = BooleanConstant
3 = DateTimeOffsetConstant
4 = DecimalConstant
5 = FloatingConstant
6 = GuidConstant
7 = IntegerConstant
8 = StringConstant
9 = DurationConstant
10 = Null
11 = Record
12 = Collection
13 = Path
14 = If
15 = Cast
16 = IsType
17 = FunctionApplication
18 = LabeledExpressionReference
19 = Labeled
20 = PropertyPath
21 = NavigationPropertyPath
22 = DateConstant
23 = TimeOfDayConstant
24 = EnumMember
25 = AnnotationPath

IEdmDirectValueAnnotationsManager.description: Manages getting and setting direct annotations on EDM elements.

Elements.description: Gets a collection of the elements of this entity container.

IEdmEntityContainerElement.description: Represents the common elements of all EDM entity container elements.

ContainerElementKind.description: Gets the kind of element of this container element.

Container.description: Gets the container that contains this element.

EdmContainerElementKind.description:
Defines EDM container element types.

0 = None
1 = EntitySet
2 = ActionImport
3 = FunctionImport
4 = Singleton

NavigationPropertyBindings.description: Gets the navigation property bindings of this navigation source.

Path.description: Gets the path of this navigation source.

Type.description: Gets the type of this navigation source.

IEdmNavigationPropertyBinding.description: Represents a binding from an EDM navigation property to a navigation source.

Path.description: Get the path that a navigation property targets.

Partner.description: Gets the partner of this navigation property.

OnDelete.description: Gets the action to execute on the deletion of this end of a bidirectional association.

ContainsTarget.description: Gets a value indicating whether the navigation target is contained inside the navigation source.

ReferentialConstraint.description: Gets the referential constraint for this navigation, returning null if this is the principal end or if there is no referential constraint.

EdmOnDeleteAction.description:
Enumerates the actions EDM can apply on deletes.

0 = None
1 = Cascade

IEdmReferentialConstraint.description: Represents an EDM referential constraint on a navigation property.

PropertyPairs.description: Gets the set of property pairs from the referential constraint. No particular ordering should be assumed.

EdmReferentialConstraintPropertyPair.description: Represents a pair of properties as part of a referential constraint.

DependentProperty.description: The local or dependent property in the referential constraint property pair. Will never be null.

PrincipalProperty.description: The foreign or principal property in the referential constraint property pair. Will never be null.

IEdmStructuralProperty.description: Represents an EDM structural (i.e. non-navigation) property.

DefaultValueString.description: Gets the default value of this property.

PathSegments.description: Gets the path segments as a decomposed qualified name. "A.B/C/D.E" is { "A.B", "C", "D.E" }.

ODataPath.description: Provides an object representation for an OData path with additional information about the EDM type and entity set for the path.

EdmType.description: Gets the EDM type of the path.

NavigationSource.description: Gets the navigation source of the path.

Segments.description: Gets the path segments for the OData path.

PathTemplate.description: Gets the path template describing the types of segments in the path.

ODataPathSegment.description: The semantic representation of a segment in a path.

Identifier.description: Returns the identifier for this segment i.e. string part without the keys.

ODataRawQueryOptions.description: Represents the raw query values in the string format from the incoming request.

Filter.description: Gets the raw $filter query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Apply.description: Gets the raw $apply query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

OrderBy.description: Gets the raw $orderby query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Top.description: Gets the raw $top query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Skip.description: Gets the raw $skip query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Select.description: Gets the raw $select query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Expand.description: Gets the raw $expand query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Count.description: Gets the raw $count query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

Format.description: Gets the raw $format query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

SkipToken.description: Gets the raw $skiptoken query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

DeltaToken.description: Gets the raw $deltatoken query value from the incoming request Uri if exists.

SelectExpandQueryOption.description: Represents the OData $select and $expand query options.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the $select and $expand query validator.

SelectExpandClause.description: Gets the parsed SelectExpandClause for this query option.

LevelsMaxLiteralExpansionDepth.description:
Gets or sets the number of levels that a top level $expand=NavigationProperty($levels=max)
will be expanded.
This value will decrease by one with each nesting level in the $expand clause.
For example, with a property value 5, the following query $expand=A($expand=B($expand=C($levels=max)))
will be interpreted as $expand=A($expand=B($expand=C($levels=3))).
If the query gets validated, the MaxExpansionDepth value
must be greater than or equal to this value.

SelectExpandQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate a SelectExpandQueryOption based on the ODataValidationSettings.

SelectExpandClause.description: Class representing the combined semantic meaning of any select or expand clauses in the uri.

SelectedItems.description: Gets the selected properties and operations.

AllSelected.description: Gets a flag indicating that everything at this level has been selected.

SelectItem.description: An item that has been selected by the query at the current level of the tree.

ApplyQueryOption.description: This defines a $apply OData query option for querying.

ApplyClause.description: Gets the parsed ApplyClause for this query option.
Represents the set of transformations to perform as part of $apply.

Transformations.description: The collection of transformations to perform.

TransformationNode.description: Base class for all transformation nodes.

FilterQueryOption.description: This defines a $filter OData query option for querying.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the Filter Query Validator

FilterClause.description: Gets the parsed FilterClause for this query option.

FilterQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate a FilterQueryOption based on the ODataValidationSettings.

FilterClause.description: The result of parsing a $filter query option.

Expression.description: Gets the filter expression - this should evaluate to a single boolean value.

RangeVariable.description: Gets the parameter for the expression which represents a single value from the collection.

ItemType.description: Gets the type of item returned by this clause.

SingleValueNode.description: Base class for all semantic metadata bound nodes which represent a single composable value.

Kind.description: Gets the kind of this node.

Public enumeration of kinds of query nodes. A subset of InternalQueryNodeKind

1 = Constant
2 = Convert
3 = NonResourceRangeVariableReference

5 = UnaryOperator

27 = SingleComplexNode

RangeVariable.description:
A RangeVariable, which represents an iterator variable either over a collection, either of entities or not.
Exists outside of the main SemanticAST, but hooked in via a RangeVariableReferenceNode (either Non-Entity or Entity).

OrderByQueryOption.description: This defines a $orderby OData query option for querying.

OrderByNodes.description: Gets the mutable list of OrderByPropertyNode instances for this query option.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the OrderBy Query Validator.

OrderByClause.description: Gets the parsed OrderByClause for this query option.

OrderByNode.description: Represents a single order by expression in the $orderby clause.

Direction.description: Gets the OrderByDirection for the current node.

OrderByDirection.description:
Enumeration of order by directions.

0 = Ascending
1 = Descending

OrderByQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate an OrderByQueryOption based on the ODataValidationSettings.

OrderByClause.description: Represents the result of parsing the $orderby query option.

ThenBy.description: Gets the next orderby to perform after performing this orderby, can be null in the case of only a single orderby expression.

RangeVariable.description: Gets the rangeVariable for the expression which represents a single value from the collection we iterate over.

ItemType.description: Gets the type of a single item from the collection returned after ordering.

SkipQueryOption.description: This defines a $skip OData query option for querying.

Value.description: Gets the value of the $skip as a parsed integer.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the Skip Query Validator.

SkipQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate a SkipQueryOption based on the ODataValidationSettings.

SkipTokenQueryOption.description: This defines a $skiptoken OData query option for querying.

Context.description: Gets and sets the given ODataQueryContext.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the SkipToken Query Validator.

QuerySettings.description: Gets or sets the query setting

SkipTokenQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate a SkipTokenQueryOption based on the ODataValidationSettings.

ODataQuerySettings.description: This class describes the settings to use during query composition.

EnsureStableOrdering.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether query composition should
alter the original query when necessary to ensure a stable sort order.

HandleNullPropagation.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating how null propagation should
be handled during query composition.

EnableConstantParameterization.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether constants should be parameterized. Parameterizing constants
would result in better performance with Entity framework.

EnableCorrelatedSubqueryBuffering.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether queries with expanded navigations should be formulated
to encourage correlated subquery results to be buffered.
Buffering correlated subquery results can reduce the number of queries from N + 1 to 2
by buffering results from the subquery.

PageSize.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of query results to return.

HandleReferenceNavigationPropertyExpandF.description:
Honor $filter inside $expand of non-collection navigation property.
The expanded property is only populated when the filter evaluates to true.
This setting is false by default.

HandleNullPropagationOption.description:
This enum defines how to handle null propagation in queryable support.

0 = Default
1 = True
2 = False

ODataQueryOptions.description:
This defines a composite OData query options that can be used to perform query composition.
Currently this only supports $filter, $orderby, $top, $skip, and $count.

Request.description: Gets the request message associated with this instance.

RawValues.description: Gets the raw string of all the OData query options

Validator.description: Gets or sets the query validator.

IfMatch.description: Gets the ETag from IfMatch header.

IfNoneMatch.description: Gets the ETag from IfNoneMatch header.

TopQueryOption.description: This defines a $top OData query option for querying.

Value.description: Gets the value of the $top as a parsed integer.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the Top Query Validator.

TopQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate a TopQueryOption based on the ODataValidationSettings.

CountQueryOption.description: Represents the value of the $count query option and exposes a way to retrieve the number of entities that satisfy a query.

Value.description: Gets the value of the $count in a parsed form.

Validator.description: Gets or sets the $count query validator.

CountQueryValidator.description:
Represents a validator used to validate a CountQueryOption 
based on the ODataValidationSettings.

ODataQueryValidator.description: Represents a validator used to validate OData queries based on the ODataValidationSettings.

IsWellFormed.description: Gets or sets whether the ETag is well-formed.

EntityType.description: Gets or sets an entity type of the ETag.

IsAny.description: Gets or sets whether the ETag is corresponding to "*".

IsIfNoneMatch.description: Gets or sets whether If-None-Match set in the request header.

ETagOfCatalogItem.description: OData ETag of an entity type .

IsWellFormed.description: Gets or sets whether the ETag is well-formed.

EntityType.description: Gets or sets an entity type of the ETag.

IsAny.description: Gets or sets whether the ETag is corresponding to "*".

IsIfNoneMatch.description: Gets or sets whether If-None-Match set in the request header.
